org.apache.sling.sample.slingshot.ratings

Interface RatingsService


  • public interface RatingsService
    Service for handling the ratings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getRating(Resource resource)
      Get the overall rating for a resource.
      double getRating(Resource resource, String userId)
      Get the rating of a user for a resource.
      String getRatingsResourcePath(Resource resource)
      Return the path to the ratings resource for a resource.
      void setRating(Resource resource, String userId, double rating)
      Set the rating of a user for a resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getRatingsResourcePath

        String getRatingsResourcePath(Resource resource)
        Return the path to the ratings resource for a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The content resource, this is usually an entry.
        Returns:
        The path to the ratings resource or null if the passed in content resource is not part of Slingshot.

      • getRating

        double getRating(Resource resource)
        Get the overall rating for a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The content resource, this is usually an entry.
        Returns:
        The rating or 0 if the passed in content resource is not part of Slingshot.

      • getRating

        double getRating(Resource resource,
                 String userId)
        Get the rating of a user for a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The content resource, this is usually an entry.
        userId - The user id
        Returns:
        The rating or 0 if the passed in content resource is not part of Slingshot.

      • setRating

        void setRating(Resource resource,
               String userId,
               double rating)
        throws PersistenceException
        Set the rating of a user for a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The content resource, this is usually an entry.
        userId - The user id
        Throws:
        PersistenceException
